description.p: The text shown for the frame's label.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Frame label]* property defines text to show at the top of the frame. For a frame with a *[ui:Frame type]* of 'Simple', the label is shown center aligned with the frame's border:

description.p: In a modern frame, the label is shown in a header above the frame's body:
The *[ui:Frame label]* can include HTML. For example, you could use <b> tags to add bold text to the frame's label:
HTML is often included to add dynamic elements to the frame's label. For an example of dynamically changing the frame's label, see the [onOpen function] and [onClose function] properties.
